ai-patthana2.5:263.1_0: (They are) associated with knots but are not associated with the knots but are not knots in the world. Des and the causes and conditions for the sake of the paths of all activities. All these things are conditions for the sake of the ever.
ai-patthana2.5:264.1_0: (They are) associated with knots and associated with the knots but are not associated with the yokes’:) and the roots and the ties, and the collections of the Teachings. Unsuitable things are not rooted in the same way.
ai-patthana2.5:265.1_0: ‘Hopefully there is something associated with the ties, and the teaching associated with the objects of the teaching. That is a condition for the object, and that arises condition.’
ai-patthana2.5:265.1_1: (They are) to be rooted in the roots and are not connected with the ties.
ai-patthana2.5:265.1_2: The roots are to be done, and the tiess arise, and the aggregates arise.
ai-patthana2.5:266.1_0: (They are) associated with knots but not knots. All the teaching is associated with the objects of the Dhamma. ... They’re not included in the categories or not? Are there any ties of the teaching.
ai-patthana2.5:266.1_1: (They are) to be roots but are not phenomena. Then they arise in a fragrance.
ai-patthana2.5:266.1_2: (They are) to be roots but not knots. The aggregates arise in them, and the thoughts are given up with the ties.
ai-patthana2.5:267.1_0: In this way, also three, and three answers to the same kind of object.
ai-patthana2.5:267.1_1: for one who prevents transmigration even in between, there is no counterpart in the next life.
ai-patthana2.5:268.0.2_0: The section on the basis of conditioned position
ai-patthana2.5:268.1_0: Ninely causes new deeds to be produced in the ninth orifices. Nine were created in the ninth and produced. When there are nine faculties, nine faculties, nine faculties, nine faculties, and nine faculties, nine. When the nine faculties, there is nine.
ai-patthana2.5:269.1_0: The three should be done by one.
ai-patthana2.5:269.1_1: And the support of the objects, and the ninety-three should be expanded as objects,
ai-patthana2.5:270.1_0: The knocked on knots is finished.
ai-patthana2.5:271.1_0: Attachments the fragrance of perfumes, making known by the tip of the nose, and the foreignorance. It is due to the aggregates of forms give rise to the three flavors of scents.
ai-patthana2.5:271.1_2: or at the moment of connection ...
ai-patthana2.5:271.1_4: (They should be expanded as in the midst of the bowls.)
ai-patthana2.5:272.1_0: The fragrance of ties is finished.
ai-patthana2.5:273.1_0: The additional permutation series is finished.
